about_the_game:
Support the developer of Annie and the Art Gallery, and get access to bonus content, original-resolution images, and more!

This DLC Contains:
  • Original game font. (.ttf and .otf)
  • Original quality art used in the game. (High-res lossless .png)
  • Original art files used for the game. (.kra)
  • Concept art and deleted scenes.
  • All original pixel tilesets.
  • And more!

Annie and the Art Gallery's OST is not available via Steam, please listen to it on Youtube or Spotify!

This DLC is meant as a way to support me financially for those who enjoyed Annie and the Art Gallery. I am a solo developer based in the New England region, and it really means a lot to me that you've read this far. Thank you!

Please Note: To access the DLC once installed, navigate to the game folder on Steam (steamapps/common/Annie and the Art Gallery). There should be a new folder titled DIGITAL_ARTBOOK alongside the main game folder.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains depictions of depression, anxiety, and suicide. Also contains strong language and depictions of blood.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: a processor that can load pictures from memory
  • Graphics: a gpu that can render pictures on a screen
  • Additional Notes: Print Version of the 250MB Krita Files Coming Soon to Stores Near You!
